# Create an image for an in-app purchase

**Web Service Endpoint**

Reserve an image asset to appear in the App Store, representing an in-app purchase.

## Discussion



## Endpoints

- **Read in-app purchase image information**: Read details about a specific in-app purchase image.
- **List in-app purchase images**: List all images for a specific in-app purchase.
- **Read in-app purchase image information**: Read details about a specific in-app purchase image.
- **Delete an in-app purchase image**: Delete the image asset that appears on the App Store listing that represents an in-app purchase.
